Sentence: Douglas is now ready to run through the town and its ravine, the gateway to the wilderness, with his (Douglas) pals Charlie Woodman and John Huff
Charlie takes John and Douglas to meet Colonel Freeleigh, a very old man whom they call a Time Machine because his (Douglas) stories transport them back to an earlier time
John Huff, Douglas's best friend, informs him (Douglas) that he (Douglas) is moving away, to Milwaukee
Douglas is crushed by John's departure, and he (Douglas) deals with the loss of his (Douglas) friend by getting very angry with him (Douglas) for leaving
